resources.string:
Herdays is an inclusive app.

 It provides all you need a tool to record, monitor your own menstrual cycle, especially useful for women wishing to conceive.


Herdays is the app for every lady giving you the freedom to worry-free and about your period coming at sudden times. It helps keep track total menstrual cycle.

 It's the ultimate app to keep every lady happy!


Herdays provide the following: A comprehensive calendar and personal health log;
 Record your monthly period and calculate ovulation date and check for a pregnancy chance;
 Herdays:Diary will record your past period.


Other functions include setting for cycle length:
 1 day reminder before coming period and ovulation days, countdown of the pregnancy and due date.
